summary: Buy new decorative statics from Sadri at Windhelm
descriptionHtml:
[font=Courier New][color=#0000ff][size=5][b]ONLY FOR THOSE WHO HAVE A MOD WHICH CAN MOVE STATIC !

[/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Adds new decorative clutter,which can be purchased at Sadri's Used Wares at Windhelm.
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Adds follwoing items :
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]- Telescope
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]- Syringe
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]- Elven Lamp
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]- Mirror
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]- Sextant
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]- Microscope
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]- Hourglass
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]- Waterpipe
- Globe
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]- Chessboard
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]- Witches Cauldron
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]- Silver Bowl Set
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]- Silver Goblet Set
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]- Scales
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]- Flask
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]- Mortar And Pestle Silver
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]- Pearls
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]- Globe
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]- Gramophone
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]- Lyre
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]- Alchemical Tools

[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]If you want to decorate your home,there are several mods on Nexus which allow you to[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]move statics.I personally recommend Jaxonx Positioner,which I use myself :)[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]
[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89645]New Decoration Clutter 2[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89889]New Decoration Clutter 3[/url]

[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Hope you like this oneÂ  :)
